text.div:
V3 Value SetemploymentStatusODH

Concepts representing whether a person does or does not currently have a job or is not currently in the labor pool seeking employment.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue where concept is-a _EmploymentStatus
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue
    CodeDisplay
    _EmploymentStatus_EmploymentStatusConcepts representing whether a person does or does not currently have a job or is not currently in the labor pool seeking employment.
